CustomField.formula: CASE(Coupon_type__c , 'Unscheduled Event', 'Cancellation or Customer Experience', 'Customer Compensation' , 'Cancellation or Customer Experience', 'Change to deal' , 'Cancellation or Customer Experience', 'Minimum Numbers' , 'Cancellation or Customer Experience', 'Gift Voucher' , 'Marketing with Consideration', 'Gift Coupon', 'Marketing with Consideration', 'Promotion', 'Marketing without Consideration', 'Promotion / Competition' , 'Marketing without Consideration', 'Loyalty', 'Marketing without Consideration', 'Complaint' , 'Customer Experience', 'Staff' , 'Staff' , '')
CustomField.label: Group
